messages.blocks_you_always_wanted.wrong_: Fences/gates can be put onto a matching slab or a smooth-stone slab.
messages.blocks_you_always_wanted.craft_: Try crafting a wide gate from two small ones.
messages.blocks_you_always_wanted.rail_t: Put the gate over powered rail or a common iron rail.
messages.blocks_you_always_wanted.straig: Gate can go over straight rails only.
messages.blocks_you_always_wanted.rails_: Put the gate across rails (from another angle).
